sentences.en: A dragonfly flying. Kitty see aside Diaoyugan on Quzhuo dragonflies.
sentences.cn: 蜻蜓又飞来了, 蝴蝶又飞来了,小猫就像没看见一样.

sentences.en: A dragonfly has a life spen of 24 hours.
A dragonfly sows its eggs while skimming the surface of the water.
sentences.cn: 蜻蜓总是在水面上撒卵。

sentences.en: A dragonfly sows its eggs while skimming the surfacethe water.
sentences.cn: 蜻蜓总是在水面上撒卵.

sentences.en: At that time many of the dragonfly ah really.
sentences.cn: 那时候的蜻蜓可真多啊.

sentences.en: Could that dragonfly flying above that drain be the answer to my prayers?
sentences.cn: 那只在排水沟上空飞着的蜻蜓能作为我祈求的答案吗？

sentences.en: How does a dragonfly twirl and dive in flight?
sentences.cn: 蜻蜓在飞行中是如何旋转和俯冲的?

sentences.en: I looked up to see if the dragonfly was still there.
sentences.cn: 我抬起头想看看那只蜻蜓还在不在.

sentences.en: I yelled as I tried to catch the dragonfly.
sentences.cn: 我一边喊着一边想抓住那只蜻蜓.
英布里给我抓了一只蜻蜓.

sentences.en: It looks like a blue dragonfly.
sentences.cn: 它看上去像只蓝色蜻蜓。

sentences.en: Let ourselves piece together the dragonfly well.
sentences.cn: 让我们自己来把蜻蜓拼好吧。

sentences.en: Like a dragonfly skimming the water.
sentences.cn: 就那麽蜻蜓点水似的,点到为止.

sentences.en: The dragonfly feeds on mosquitoes and flies.
The dragonfly saw the girl was sad and wanted to help her.
sentences.cn: 蜻蜓看到难过的女孩并想要帮助她.

sentences.en: They're also the friends of farmers The dragonfly is one of them.
sentences.cn: 它们同样也是农民的朋友,蜻蜓就是其中之一.

sentences.en: Variegated Flutterer is a distinctive dragonfly in Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 在香港,斑丽翅蜻是一种容易辨认的蜻蜓.

sentences.en: We use the small dragonfly as bait to fish the big one.
sentences.cn: 只不过我们是利用小蜻蜓的身子来充当诱饵,利用它来钓大蜻蜓.

sentences.en: When I looked back, the dragonfly was still there.
sentences.cn: 我再看的时候, 那只巨大的蜻蜓还在.

trans.tran_en: a brightly-coloured insect with a long thin body and transparent wings which lives near water
